panels.visual: Wide shot of the Imperial audience chamber. The Emperor sits on the Dragon Throne, hooded eyes unreadable. Wei stands at his side. Lueduo kneels alone on the vast marble floor, a tiny figure before absolute power. Golden light streams through high windows.
panels.dialogue: TangEmperor: "Minister Zhang wants your head. He is valuable. His support is important."

panels.visual: Close-up of the Emperor leaning forward on his throne, his mouth curved with cruel amusement. Wei's thin smile visible behind him. The judgment is delivered - exile disguised as opportunity.
panels.dialogue: TangEmperor: "Go, then. Die usefully if you can. Do not return without something of value. My patience has limits."
panels.narration: The journey west took him back along the Silk Road, through cities he had passed in chains.
